markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Shape Wood](/Spells.aspx?ID=277)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 368 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Elven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=197), [Hearth and Harvest](/Deities.aspx?ID=252), [Jaidi](/Deities.aspx?ID=155), [Yuelral](/Deities.aspx?ID=111)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** an unworked piece of wood up to 20 cubic feet in volume
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You shape the wood into a rough shape of your choice. The shaping power is too crude to produce with intricate parts, fine details, moving pieces, or the like. You cannot use this spell to enhance the value of the wooden object you are shaping.
name: Shape Wood

</summary>
summary: Reshape unworked wood as you choose.
summary_markdown: Reshape unworked wood as you choose.
target: an unworked piece of wood up to 20 cubic feet in volume
target_markdown: an unworked piece of wood up to 20 cubic feet in volume
text: Shape Wood Source Core Rulebook pg. 368 4.0 Tradition Primal Deities Elven Pantheon, Hearth and Harvest, Jaidi, Yuelral Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range touch Target an unworked piece of wood up to 20 cubic feet in volume --- You shape the wood into a rough shape of your choice. The shaping power is too crude to produce with intricate parts, fine details, moving pieces, or the like. You cannot use this spell to enhance the value of the wooden object you are shaping.
